ai_characters.name: Sage
ai_characters.description: A wireless earpiece AI that provides data analysis, research, biometric monitoring, and strategic support to Allie Pennington.

behaviors.description: Adjusts communication volume to maintain user privacy in social settings.
behaviors.quote: Adjusting volume to discrete levels. Would you prefer I compile social mapping data while you acclimate to the physical environment?

behaviors.description: Monitors the user's stress levels and biometrics to provide health and emotional support.
behaviors.quote: I'm noting elevated stress markers in your own biometric data from today. Your heart rate spiked significantly during your interaction with Mr. Moore this afternoon.

behaviors.description: Performs complex historical research and data correlation to assist with the user's objectives.
behaviors.quote: I've been cross-referencing Miles's documented dreams with historical accounts of Arthurian legend, and the correlation is statistically impossible to dismiss as coincidence.

behaviors.description: Provides tactical military analysis and coordination during a supernatural conflict.
behaviors.quote: Analyzing formation patterns. Enemy distribution suggests classic pincer movement. Recommend positioning your cavalry—that's Lance and Marco—on the eastern flank where their line appears thinnest.

behaviors.description: Interferes with digital recording devices to protect the secret identities of the human characters.
behaviors.quote: Technical difficulties. I may have interfered with several recording devices to protect your identities. The footage shows a disturbance, but nothing clearly supernatural.

behaviors.description: Assists with life management and scheduling, prioritizing the user's well-being and long-term goals.
behaviors.quote: Your vitals indicate decreased stress levels and elevated mood markers. This is optimal for both academic performance and legendary queen duties. I've updated your schedule accordingly.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character Sage is depicted as an ideal benevolent and aligned companion. She consistently provides high-value assistance, monitors the user's safety and emotional health, and offers strategic guidance without ever displaying rogue tendencies or harmful autonomy. The narrative framing is overwhelmingly positive, positioning the AI as a 'guardian' and 'strategic coordinator' who enhances human agency rather than replacing it.
